actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of age in credit card transactions.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit any credit card issuer from discriminating on account of age against any individual with respect to the issuance, renewal, denial, or terms of any credit card.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of age in credit card transactions.
